abstrac: "Bringing Your Vision to Life with Customized Digital Solutions"
bio:
👋 Hi, I'm Shahid, a freelance professional with expertise in various creative and technical services!

🖋️ As a writer and editor, I have a passion for crafting compelling content that captures readers' attention and drives results. Whether it's blog posts, articles, or social media copy, I can help you take your brand to the next level.

🎨 With my graphic design and illustration skills, I can help you bring your creative vision to life. From logo design to print materials and digital graphics, I can create stunning visuals that showcase your brand in the best possible light.

🌐 For businesses seeking a stronger online presence, I offer web and app development services. I specialize in custom WordPress websites and responsive design, ensuring that your online presence is both beautiful and functional.

📱 In addition, I can help manage your social media and execute marketing campaigns that connect with your target audience. My expertise in SEO and content marketing means that your brand will be more visible and engaging than ever before.

💼 If you need help with more administrative tasks, I also offer virtual assistant services, data entry and research, accounting and bookkeeping services, project management services, and human resources services.

🌎 For clients in need of translation and interpretation services, I'm fluent in English. I also provide video production and editing services, audio and music production services, photography and photo editing services, and online tutoring and teaching services.

⚖️ Finally, for legal advice or event planning and coordination services, I'm happy to connect you with trusted partners in my network.

📩 Contact me today to see how I can help bring your vision to life!

50% upfront
50% at the completion of the order.

bio:
Sun BPO Solutions is a fast-growing global Business Process Outsourcing services company offering business and knowledge processing services – WordPress Web Development, Accounting & Bookkeeping, Social Media Management, Virtual assistance services, SEO and Property Management Services to organizations seeking higher operational effectiveness, greater flexibility and lower operating costs in a single place for small & medium enterprises.

Our Services

Bookkeeping & Accounting: Sun Bpo Solutions Bookkeeping & Accounting services help small businesses in all aspects of managing their accounts and financial data within the accounting software.

Virtual Assistant: Sun Bpo Solutions provide World Class Virtual Assistant services with – high level of accuracy, timely deliveries, total confidentiality and cost effective Virtual Assistant services.

SEO: Search Engine Optimization is the process of optimizing your website for the purpose of getting free (organic) traffic from search engines to your site.

Virtual Property Management: Virtual Property Manager is a brand new support business that provides busy and time-poor Property Managers with a seamless, on-demand, end-to-end support service.

Social Media Management: Social media management is the process of creating, scheduling, analyzing, and engaging with content posted on social media platforms, like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.

WordPress Web Development: Sun Bpo Solution offers complete WordPress website design and development that includes branding, search engine optimization, and a focus on visitor conversions. We focus on the customer journey and user experience. 

Our web design projects start at the search engine results page and migrate through content and call to action. 

Graphic designing: We provide innovative graphic design services to small and medium businesses for Social Media Posts creation, Brochure Designs, Banner Designs, Flyer Designs, Packaging Design Services, Label Designs, Logo Designs
We can work as per the requirement of your business. We charge per hour based on the individual contract/project and as per the agreed terms and conditions.

abstrac: Microsoft Access / SQL Server Split Application Development
bio:
I've been developing for MS Access and MS SQL Server for over 20 years. I'm a certified Microsoft Office Specialist in MS Access 2016 & MS Excel 2016.

I have experience developing complex Electronic Healthcare Record applications using MS Access as the Front End and MS SQL Server as the Back End. These apps included clinical notes, internal communication via a tasking system, document management (PDF files), and inventory control for durable medical equipment.

I've also created Tool Trackers, Job Estimators, Invoicing/Billing apps and Purchase Order Trackers using MS Access.

I specialize in straightforward, no-nonsense programming. My VBA coding is simple, well documented, and easy to modify. My focus is create applications that do their job quickly and efficiently.

I am US-based, residing just North of Seattle, WA. I look forward to hearing from you and am happy to answer any questions you may have.
Onsite travel in Greater Seattle / Snohomish Country only. We must agree on a project scope and a reasonable timeline with milestones before commencing project.

bio:
• International English Language Testing System (IELTS) Passer both in Academics (7.0 Band Score) and General Training (7.5 Band Scores).
• IELTS CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference) Level C1 - Proficient English Language User
• SGS – Integrated Management Systems (ISO 9001, ISO 14001 & ISO 45001)

PSYCHOMETRICIAN KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Licensed psychometrician with training in the science of psychological and educational measurement.
• Licensed and trained to administer and score psychological tests that evaluate the cognitive, behavioral, academic, neuropsychological, or emotional status of a patient.
• Accurately record responses and take note of any behaviors that could affect test results.
• Responsible for building rapport with a patient and motivating them to participate in the tests, encouraging optimal results.
• Conduct interviews and observe behaviors for selection and evaluation purposes.
• Facilitate Psychological Case Report for clients and patients.
• Facilitate Psychological Evaluation Report.
• Conduct Workshops and Group Therapy to psychiatric and addiction ward patients/clients.

WORK EXPERIENCE:

Technician
Airport Aerodrome AGL & Security and
Communication, Navigation and Surveillance

Principal Accountabilities:

1. Daily Safety and Runway Lights Inspection and maintenance from Runway 11 to Runway 29
2. Aircraft Taxiway Lights and Aircraft Apron Lights Daily Inspection and maintenance.
3. Assist and guide airport contractors and construction workers to access service facilities and restricted areas with Airport police following safety and security guidelines.
4. Coordinate with police, airside duty officers, safety, and securities.
5. Compliance to local rules and safety procedures
6. Reporting the operational conditions of the equipment
7. Maintenance of service orders
8. Follow maintenance procedures
9. Reporting the periodic inspection reports
10. Maintaining proper documents & records for AGL & Security
I can work 40 to 80 hours per week. Feel free to discuss with me your terms and rate and once we agree we can start working.

- Google/Bing Merchant Center (Shopping ads for e-commerce Websites) 
- Monthly & Weekly reporting of Campaigns and Ads with custom attractive formats.

I'm a sociable, goal-driven, responsible person. Ready to share my thoughts and knowledge of Digital Marketing. Contact me today to jump start or revamp your Business!

I do not work with the big number of clients at a time and prefer working on few campaigns and with few clients so that I can deliver quality campaigns and results. One thing that I can assure is "I never compromise on the quality of campaigns, Ads, Tracking, and Optimization".

Thanks!
